pullRequest.title: [load-testing] Always build agent with Java 11
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
When running the load tests, we always want to build the agent with Java 11.
Here is some sample output showing the variables being set:

nodes.bodyText:
I didn't understand the trick of nester withEnv steps, but I just tested and it seems there is no other way.
Regarding the PATH variable, can we skip ORIG_PATH and use "JAVA_HOME+PATH=${env.JAVA_HOME}/bin"? See with-env for a better explanation of what I mean :)
